**Carpentries-Israel** is an unofficial, local interest group for students and researchers in Israel who are interested in attending [Carpentries](carpentries.org) workshops, learning how to become a Carpentries instructor, or writing or contributing to Carpentries lesson materials!

Workshop events we've held so far:

-   [Data Carpentry Genomics, 29-31 October 2024](https://carpentries-israel.github.io/2024-10-29-wis){target="_blank"}

How to connect and join:

-   Join the carpentries-israel.slack.com #Slack workspace using [this link](https://join.slack.com/t/carpentries-israel/shared_invite/zt-2uu39vo5i-5MqBVAv3mf_h1n~_xLQxCA)

-   Join the [Carpentries-Israel LinkedIn group](https://www.linkedin.com/groups/13126506/){target="_blank"}

-   Fill out our [expression of interest form](https://forms.gle/tEtkFrugxrEng7Ss7){target="_blank"} to be contacted about future workshops
